name: darevel-chat-backend-java
description: Java Spring Boot Microservices Backend for Darevel Chat

scripts.dev:local: concurrently "npm run db:start" "npm run wait-for-db" "npm run services:start"
scripts.db:start: docker run -d --name darevel-postgres -e POSTGRES_USER=darevel_chat -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=darevel_chat123 -e POSTGRES_DB=darevel_chat -p 5432:5432 postgres:15-alpine 2>/dev/null || docker start darevel-postgres
scripts.services:start: concurrently -n auth,chat,perms -c blue,green,yellow "cd auth-service && mvn spring-boot:run" "cd chat-service && mvn spring-boot:run" "cd permissions-service && mvn spring-boot:run"
scripts.setup: npm run services:build && npm run docker:up

author: Darevel Team
